text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump #COVID19 is hurting #doctors, those in hospitals, ERs, and private practices throughout the country. We are bleeding. We are being asked to volunteer our services. What we need is #hazardpay #loanforgiveness #faircompensation
